author: MDM Staff
title: PTDA Launches Initiative for PT/MC Career Recruitment
text:
Lead image courtesy of PTDA
The Power Transmission Distributors Association (PTDA) launched the initiative “Start Your Career. Move the World.”
PTDA said the initiative and marketing campaign aims to raise industry awareness and attract talent by highlighting the key roles of power transmission/motion control employers. It offers customizable recruitment tools that companies can tailor to showcase the impact across industries like manufacturing, medical, food and transportation. According to the Dec. 5 news release, the tagline emphasizes PT/MC’s role in driving innovation and production.
“Our industry offers a diverse and exciting range of careers that form the backbone of critical systems, enhancing lives and making a global impact every day,” PTDA Foundation President Matt Pavlinsky said in a Dec. 5 news release. “This new initiative equips PT/MC employers with the tools to share their stories and connect with the next generation of talent, who highly value meaningful work and careers offering work/life balance.”
